messages: @Reiku78 Not really. My FiOS connection is nuts. Even back home in Louisiana with DSL, patience tells me I'd only lose 1 night of gaming.
@ForumTitanfall The minimalism of his overlay should keep it out of the way, but it's something other designers like myself should remember.
